message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase the product. I am willing to pay $85 for it.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $85. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $92.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and I'm still interested in purchasing the product. I would like to propose an offer of $87.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $87. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer of $95. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $90.
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $90. I'm getting close, but I still need to make a bit more profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $96.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer of $96. I understand your desire for profit, but I believe we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to counter with an offer of $92.
